SELECT b.userloginid,b.userloginphone,a.username,a.usermale,a.usercardnum,b.userlogintype,c.accounttypename as userlogintypename FROM userinfo as a left join userlogininfo as b on b.userloginid = a.userloginid left join accounttype as c on b.userLoginType= c.accounttypeid
where b.userLoginType = #{0}

SELECT a.username,a.usermale,a.usercardnum,a.usercardphoto,a.useradrprovince,a.useradrcity,a.useradrarea,a.useradrother,a.userage, userloginphone,b.userloginpix,b.userlogintype,c.accounttypename as userlogintypename FROM userinfo as a left join userlogininfo as b on b.userloginid = a.userloginid left join accounttype as c on b.userLoginType= c.accounttypeid WHERE a.userLoginId=#{id}
